analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HAICrowdsale.finish (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
	- token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
	- token.mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
	- token.mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
_stage in HAICrowdsale.setCrowdsaleStage (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol#531) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol#243-261) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol#257-259)

HAICrowdsale.finish (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
	-token.mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
	-token.mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)

Reentrancy in HAICrowdsale.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol#548-564):
	External calls:
	- buyTokens(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol#561)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalWeiRaisedDuringPreICO (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol#562-564)

Reentrancy in HAICrowdsale.finish (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensForEcosystem (/unique_contracts/0x3109d8eec2cc8727b852aeb702d5c05c6138b66e.sol)
